description.en: A Turkish premium anime watching website with resolution boost, spesific subtitle placement and other features.
description.tr: 4k yüksek çözünürlük artırma, özel altyazı yerleştirme ve diğer özelliklere sahip, Türkçe premium anime izleme sitesi.

settings.title: Privacy Mode
settings.description: Hides all anime and episode information from your presence.

settings.title: Show Buttons
settings.description: Toggles the 'View Episode' and 'View Anime' buttons in your presence.

settings.title: Show Posters
settings.description: Toggles the display of anime posters in your presence. If disabled, the Anizium logo will be shown instead.

settings.title: Logo Type
settings.description: Select the type of Anizium logo to use when posters are hidden or unavailable.

settings.title: Watching Details (Line 1)
settings.description: Customize the first line of text in your presence while watching.

settings.title: Watching Details (Line 2)
settings.description: Customize the second line of text in your presence while watching.

settings.title: Show Timestamp
settings.description: Toggles the elapsed and remaining time of the episode in your presence.
